conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What kind of visa should I apply for if I haven't received my university admission yet?
You should apply for a prospective student visa ("Visum zur Studienbewerbung") if you haven't received your admission notification yet.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How long is the prospective student visa valid for?
The prospective student visa is usually valid for a certain period (exact duration not specified) and can be extended by up to six months if needed.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I switch to a different visa if I get admitted while on a prospective student visa?
Yes, if you're admitted to a university or foundation course during your stay, you can apply for a residence permit for studies.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, what happens if I need more time to meet admission requirements?
No worries! Your prospective student visa can be extended for up to six months if you need more time.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is the data protection the same when using the DAAD website as in the EU?
No, when using the DAAD website, there's no level of data protection comparable to EU law as third parties process usage data.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How do I consent to cookies on the DAAD website?
You can click "Accept all" or manage your preferences under "Cookies" at the end of the page, where you can also change consent later.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What options do I have if I don't want to accept all cookies?
At the end of the page under "Cookies," you'll find selection options and explanations to customize your consent.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I change my cookie preferences after accepting them?
Yes, you can adjust your cookie consent at any time with future effect in the "Cookies" section.

Do all international students need a visa for Germany?
The text mentions visa requirements apply to some but doesn't specify exceptions - you'd need to check official sources for complete rules.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What's the first step if I want to study in Germany but don't have admission yet?

You should apply for a prospective student visa ("Visum zur Studienbewerbung") to enter Germany and complete admission requirements.
